Producer: Mary Aloe, Craig Chapman, Myles Nestel, John Schwarz, Michael Schwarz, Ken Seng, Martin Sprock
Synopsis: Moe Diamond is a New York City money launderer who wakes up with no memory and millions of dollars in stolen cash and drugs. He must soon scour the streets in search of answers while trying to dodge a crew of violent and crooked cops.
Title: Killerman
